DataElement.preferredName: Immunotherapeutic Agent Related Adverse Event Infection Of Interest Present Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to the type of infection of interest immunotherapeutic related adverse event that is present.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Immunotherapeutic Agent Relationship Adverse Event Infection Interest Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any substance that induces, enhances, restores or suppresses the host's immune system, or an agent that utilizes or is derived from a component of the immune system._A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something._Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s)._The invasion of an organism's body tissues by disease-causing agents and their multiplication, as well as the reaction by the host to these organisms and/or toxins that the organisms produce._A state of curiosity or concern about or attention to something._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any substance that induces, enhances, restores or suppresses the host's immune system, or an agent that utilizes or is derived from a component of the immune system.:A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.:Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).

Concepts.definition: Any substance that induces, enhances, restores or suppresses the host's immune system, or an agent that utilizes or is derived from a component of the immune system.
A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.

Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).

Property.preferredDefinition: The invasion of an organism's body tissues by disease-causing agents and their multiplication, as well as the reaction by the host to these organisms and/or toxins that the organisms produce.:A state of curiosity or concern about or attention to something.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: The invasion of an organism's body tissues by disease-causing agents and their multiplication, as well as the reaction by the host to these organisms and/or toxins that the organisms produce.
A state of curiosity or concern about or attention to something.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Immunotherapeutic Related Adverse Event Infection Of Interest Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The type of infection of interest immunotherapeutic related adverse event.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.: The invasion of an organism's body tissues by disease-causing agents and their multiplication, as well as the reaction by the host to these organisms and/or toxins that the organisms produce.: A state of curiosity or concern about or attention to something.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
The invasion of an organism's body tissues by disease-causing agents and their multiplication, as well as the reaction by the host to these organisms and/or toxins that the organisms produce.
A state of curiosity or concern about or attention to something.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An infection caused by a fungus.

Concepts.definition: An infection caused by a fungus.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Infections with bacteria of the genus MYCOBACTERIUM.

Concepts.definition: Infection due to organisms from the genus Mycobacteria.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak.

Concepts.definition: A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
